gw.api.web.delinquency

Class DelinquencyPlanUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.delinquency.DelinquencyPlanUtil

  • public class DelinquencyPlanUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Handy helpers for Delinquency Plans, mainly to enable UI validations.

    • Method Detail

      • validateGracePeriod

        public static java.lang.String validateGracePeriod(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the content of the Grace Period on a Delinquency Plan. Cases covered:
        • Must be a non-negative integer.
        • Must have no more than 10 digits.
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when invalid data are found.

      • validateAcctEnterDelinquencyThreshold

        public static java.lang.String validateAcctEnterDelinquencyThreshold(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the content of the Account Enter Delinquency Threshold on a Delinquency Plan. Cases covered:
        • Must be greater than Writeoff Threshold [Note: Strictly Greater]
        • Must be greater than Exit Delinquency Threshold [Note: Strictly Greater]
        • Must be less than Cancellation Threshold [Note: Strictly Lesser]
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when invalid data are found.

      • validatePolEnterDelinquencyThreshold

        public static java.lang.String validatePolEnterDelinquencyThreshold(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the content of the Policy Enter Delinquency Threshold on a Delinquency Plan. Cases covered:
        • Must be greater than Writeoff Threshold [Note: Strictly Greater]
        • Must be greater than Exit Delinquency Threshold [Note: Strictly Greater]
        • Must be less than Cancellation Threshold [Note: Strictly Lesser]
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when invalid data are found.

      • validateWriteoffThreshold

        public static java.lang.String validateWriteoffThreshold(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the content of the Writeoff Threshold on a Delinquency Plan. Cases covered:
        • Must be less than Account Enter Delinquency Threshold [Note: Strictly Lesser]
        • Must be less than Policy Enter Delinquency Threshold [Note: Strictly Lesser]
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when invalid data are found.

      • validateExitDelinquencyThreshold

        public static java.lang.String validateExitDelinquencyThreshold(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the content of the Exit Delinquency Threshold on a Delinquency Plan. Four cases are covered:
        • Must be less than Account Enter Delinquency [Note: Strictly Lesser]
        • Must be less than Policy Enter Delinquency [Note: Strictly Lesser]
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when invalid data are found.

      • validateCancellationThreshold

        public static java.lang.String validateCancellationThreshold(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the content of the Cancellation Threshold on a Delinquency Plan. Four cases are covered:
        • Must be greater than Account Enter Delinquency.
        • Must be greater than Policy Enter Delinquency.
        • Cancel Policy is the largest of threshold amount among all.
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when invalid data are found.

      • validateThresholdGreater

        public static void validateThresholdGreater(java.lang.Comparable greaterValue,
                            java.lang.Comparable lesserValue,
                            com.guidewire.pl.system.locale.DisplayKey lesserFieldKey)
        Validate that the greaterValue is greater than the lesserValue
        Parameters:
        greaterValue - the greater value to compare
        lesserValue - the lesser value to compare
        lesserFieldKey - a representation of the lesser field
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when greaterValue is not greater than lesserValue

      • validateDelinquencyPlanReasons

        public static void validateDelinquencyPlanReasons(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the content of Plan Reasons on a Delinquency Plan. Mainly this means making sure that the Reasons are unique.
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when duplicate Reason values are found

      • validateDelinquencyPlanReasonUnique

        public static java.lang.Object validateDelinquencyPlanReasonUnique(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan,
                                                   DelinquencyPlanReason planReason)
        Validate the content of Plan Reasons on a Delinquency Plan. Mainly this means making sure that the Reasons are unique.
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        planReason - the reason in the plan to validate.
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when duplicate Reason values are found

      • validateDelinquencyPlanEvents

        public static void validateDelinquencyPlanEvents(DelinquencyPlan delinquencyPlan)
        Validate the Plan Events related to a Delinquency Plan. Mainly this means making sure that the Events are unique for each Reason.
        Parameters:
        delinquencyPlan - the plan to validate
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when duplicate Event values are found

      • validateDelinquencyPlanEventUnique

        public static java.lang.Object validateDelinquencyPlanEventUnique(DelinquencyPlanEvent planEvent)
        Validate the uniqueness of a Plan Event in a Delinquency Plan. Consistent use ensures that the Events are unique for each Reason.
        Parameters:
        planEvent - the event to validate
        Returns:
        null.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - when duplicate Event values are found

      • getDelinquencyWorkflows

        public static Workflow[] getDelinquencyWorkflows()
        Get all workflow types that apply to Delinquency Process (i.e., all workflows that are children of the DelProcessWorkflow entity.
        Returns:
        A list of workflow types that can be used for delinquency processing
